    • Method Detail

      • getAppHostPath

        public String getAppHostPath()
        Gets the base URL under which web applications are hosted. This AppHostPath can be used to create url links to applications that have been given fixed relative names. Examples of what this method may return:
        Servlet
        Specified by:
